subject: Physics
question_text: Given are statements for certain thermodynamic variables, (A) Internal energy, volume (V) and mass (M) are extensive variables. (B) Pressure (P), temperature (T) and density (  ) are intensive variables. (C) Volume (V), temperature (T) and density (  ) are intensive variables. (D) Mass (M), temperature (T) and internal energy

options.text: are extensive variables. Choose the correct answer from the options given below :
